channel.title: Your top 5 comics and Top 5 worst comics
channel.description:
My TOP 5
1. [b]The League of Extraordinary Gentlemen Vol 1 to 3 + the black dossier[/b]
[img]https://prettythings.pullbot.com/artworks/5741/1103_400x600_medium.jpg[/img]
Personally, this story is alot better than watchmen imo, and is nothing like that shit movie. the stories are very clever, mixing story together from novels and now in its 3rd vol.
2. [b]Kingdom Come[/b]
![](upload://ogZYW0oguzqitxgNB61Yr6Luhxw.jpeg)
Possible the best DC comic imo & add the artwork of Alex Ross and you got awesome in a bag
3. [b]Watchmen[/b]
![](upload://w9KCUP31jlQxRZBalZEVVVkd5O4.jpeg)
I been posted on a 100 threads, and everyone has a different opinion on it.
4. Most Star War comics But I gonna pick [b]Dark Empire[/b]
![](upload://i9ic4e78krxtOuVEB73H6TrwIL9.jpeg)
Possible due to the fact that the story is about the New Republic gettings its ass handed to them mostly through the story, althought they win in the end up... (not much of a spoiler) Hey its star wars
5. [b]The Killing Joke[/b]
[img]https://images3.wikia.nocookie.net/marvel_dc/images/thumb/1/13/Batman_-_The_Killing_Joke.jpg/300px-Batman_-_The_Killing_Joke.jpg[/img]
Possible the only batman comic I like, imo batman comics are overrated.
My Worst 5:
1. [b]28 Days Later: THE AFTERMATH[/b]
![](upload://rAdetyezrOKwdcZVbEA9EClNqtS.jpeg)
What shit storm of a comic!
2. [b]Doom The Comic[/b]
[img]https://www.ripten.com/wp-content/uploads/2008/08/1996-doom-comic-book-cover.jpg[/img]
Based on doom 1, this comic is hilariously bad.
view it here [url]https://www.doomworld.com/10years/doomcomic/comic.php[/url]
3. TBA
4. TBA
5. TBA
Well sorry I don't have may bad comics, but it shouldn't stop you.

item.source: Your top 5 comics and Top 5 worst comics

item.title: Your top 5 comics and Top 5 worst comics
item.dc:creator: raw_bean
item.description:
Jambo:

Favs

  1. Ultimate Spider-Man

  2. The Ultimates

  3. Watchmen

  4. Sin City

  5. The Killing Joke

Don’t have a hate list.

Woah. I haven’t read Killing Joke yet, but other than that that’s pretty much exactly the list I would have posted. I might put 300 in there myself (I’ve only started to loathe Miller since things like All Star Batman and Robin the Boy Wonder, Hot; 300 was great), but I think I’ll go for Sandman instead. No particular order on them all.

I’m fairly picky and have a lot of recommendations of stuff to go on from friends so so far I haven’t read anything I disliked enough to put on a ‘worst’ list.

Read full topic
item.source: Your top 5 comics and Top 5 worst comics

item.description:
I’ve only ever liked to Comic.

  1. Star Wars all of them really but the stories of The Great Hyperspace War are my favourite.

515×800 84.8 KB

  1. The only other comic I ever liked was Asterix and Obelix.

Never really picked up any other comics so there is nothing I hate.
